import React, {useState} from "react"; function NewRecipeForm({onFormSubmit}){ const [category, setCategory] = useState("Choose Category"); const [name, setName] = useState(""); function handleSubmit(event){ const newRecipe ={ name, description, instructions, ingredients, cook_time, category, image_url } onFormSubmit(newRecipe) } return (
) } export default NewRecipeForm;
